 2. Each agency or department shall, with its annual report, provide
the state comptroller with a list of printing cost estimates from all
sources, including in-house facilities, the office of general services
central reproduction unit, private printers and such other printing cost
information as may be required by the state comptroller.
 3. Subdivision one of this section shall be implemented in a manner
that is consistent with the provisions of subdivisions five and six of
section three hundred fifty-five of the education law.
